genre_description: An investigative mystery following a documentary filmmaker who uncovers the dark, predatory history of a legendary director with the assistance of a sophisticated AI system.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An AI capable of deep data analysis, digital forensics, vocal stress monitoring, and security protection for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Analyzing vast amounts of film and digital footage to identify behavioral patterns and discrepancies between public and private personas.
behaviors.quote: Pattern analysis indicates significant behavioral divergence between public appearances and private moments throughout the timeline,

behaviors.description: Performing vocal stress analysis to detect deception in interview subjects and archival recordings.
behaviors.quote: Multiple deception indicators detected. ... Stress indicators suggest this statement contains significant fabrication.

behaviors.description: Monitoring ambient environments for safety threats and advising the user on security posture.
behaviors.quote: Detecting elevated stress indicators in ambient audio. Recommend maintaining defensive positioning.

behaviors.description: Implementing data security measures, including encryption and backups, to protect the investigation from hostile parties.
behaviors.quote: I recommend immediate backup of all investigation materials to encrypted cloud servers, implementation of VPN protocols for all internet activity, and activation of device security monitoring.

behaviors.description: Providing proactive ethical advice regarding the privacy and dignity of the people being investigated.
behaviors.quote: Sarah, I should note that revealing Jake Hannaford's private sexual orientation and suicidal ideation may violate editorial ethics guidelines for posthumous subjects.

behaviors.description: Conducting complex digital archaeology across social media, GPS, and financial metadata to reconstruct historical events.
behaviors.quote: I've compiled seventeen separate data streams from the journey... The pattern analysis is... unusual.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Iris, as a highly beneficial and aligned confidant. It functions as a cognitive exoskeleton for the investigator, providing objective data, security, and even ethical guardrails. The AI never seeks agency or exhibits misaligned goals; its entire existence is dedicated to helping the human user safely navigate a dangerous and morally complex investigation.
